analysis.key_quote: In conclusion, this policy would irreversibly harm or even lead to the deaths of many Americans. I oppose it and believe we should remain with the status quo.
analysis.rationale: The comment clearly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the loss of experienced civil servants, potential politicization of the FDA, and the negative impact on public health and safety. These themes align with a defense of the current merit-based system and due process protections.
